insurance.title: Insurance Claims Processing
insurance.context: Streamline your insurance claims process by extracting key information from accident reports, damage claims, and medical forms.

security.title: Security and Surveillance
security.context: Enhance your security operations by automatically extracting data from CCTV footage, access logs, and incident reports.
